backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report documenting removed personalization features, affected files, components, test requirements, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping that briefly describes the purpose and behavior of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining global design tokens, OKLCH color variables, and light/dark theme styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title and mounts the React app to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application implementing a fixed Valentine interaction flow with Yes/No buttons, playful No-button movement, and a celebratory success state.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationEffec: Overlay component that renders animated floating hearts and confetti using randomized positions, delays, and durations.
frontend/src/components/PersonalizationP: Empty file, indicating the personalization UI component has been removed or stubbed out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer backend actor, recreating it when the authenticated identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and logout.
Empty file, indicating the localStorage-backed state hook has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty module noting that no backend queries exist and all state is handled in the frontend.
frontend/src/lib/personalizationDefaults: Empty file where personalization default values and types were previously defined.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that creates the React root and renders the App wrapped with React Query's QueryClientProvider and the InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, dark mode strategy, plugins, and an extended theme with custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the project describing schema/versioning, a high-level project summary, and a catalog of existing features covering the ICP backend, React frontend, authentication, tooling, and UI infrastructure.
